document.full_text: nba owners and players must take "bold" steps to avoid a lockout and prevent a slowing of the league's upward momentum, commissioner david stern said tuesday.
document.title: bold steps needed to avoid a lockout, says stern
lines_and_colors: nba owners and players must take "bold" steps to avoid a lockout and prevent a slowing of the league's upward momentum, commissioner david stern said tuesday.
